doc:
Joseph Campanella https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Joseph_Campanella 0 Joseph Anthony Campanella (November 21, 1924 – May 16, 2018) was an American character actor. He appeared in more than 200 television and film roles from the early 1950s to 2009. He was best remembered for his role as Joe Turino in Guiding Light and as Harper Deveraux on the soap opera Days of Our Lives, a role he starred in from 1987 to 1988, and his later recurring roles on General Hospital from 1991 to 1992 and The Bold and the Beautiful from 1996 to 2005. Campanella voiced the character of Dr. Curt Connors/The Lizard on Spider-Man: The Animated Series (1994–1997). He narrated the Discover science series on the Disney Channel from 1992 until 1994. Campanella was nominated for a Daytime and Primetime Emmy Award and a Tony Award throughout his career. Joseph_Anthony_Campanella ( November_21_,_1924 – May_16_,_2018 ) was an_American_character_actor . He appeared in more_than_200_television_and_film_roles from the_early_1950s to 2009 . He was_best_remembered for his_role as Joe_Turino in Guiding_Light and as Harper_Deveraux on the_soap_opera_Days of Our_Lives , a_role he starred in from 1987 to 1988 , and his_later_recurring_roles on General_Hospital from 1991 to 1992 and The_Bold and the_Beautiful from 1996 to 2005 . Campanella voiced the_character of Dr._Curt_Connors/The_Lizard on Spider-Man : The_Animated_Series_(_1994 – 1997_) . He narrated the_Discover_science_series on the_Disney_Channel from 1992 until 1994 . Campanella was_nominated for a_Daytime_and_Primetime_Emmy_Award and a_Tony_Award throughout his_career .
